content:
I totally understand the importance of balancing post frequency with overposting. I've been working as a marketing specialist at a tech startup for the past 8 months, and I've noticed that our audience is most active on Twitter during lunch breaks and after work. For LinkedIn, we've seen more engagement during work hours. I'll make sure to space out my tweets and focus on quality over quantity for LinkedIn posts. Thanks for the guidance! 

Now, I'm curious about how to measure the success of my social media campaign. Can you walk me through some key metrics I should track to determine if my campaign is performing well?
